column5: Nestled outside Boerne city limits, the downstairs king room in this Italian inspired home welcomes guests who want a quiet and private place to stay after your fun time in the Texas Hill Country. 5 min to downtown Boerne, 15 to Comfort and 40 to Fredericksburg-RIVERWALK 45 minutes. No CLEANING FEE, NO DEPOSIT and Gourmet breakfast each morning.
column8: Villa in the Oaks- private Ensuite with King Bed
